name: Cat Napped
description:
Play as a puppy who's been cat napped by the nefarious neighborhood cat mafia! Now, it's up to you to escape their sewer dungeon and make it back to your owner. Using your endless cuteness and your sad puppy eyes, you'll charm guards and turn them to your own purposes.

Featuring:

  • Unique charm mechanic that allows you to briefly control enemies
  • Stamina system makes every choice matter
  • Unique 3D lighting with 2D pixel art backgrounds
